troubleshooting.title: Crash on MacOS Big Sur When a Dialog Box is Resized

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When using on MacOS Big Sur, the application crashes when I try to use the Full Screen button or resize a dialog box (for example the Find/Replace or Preferences dialog box).

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: This is caused by an issue with resizing dialog boxes in on MacOS Big Sur (and possibly later versions).

steps-informal.p: Until this limitation is resolved, do not use the Full Screen button or resize dialog boxes in .
